@dev create deposit contract address for the default withdraw wallet

     * @param _wallet the binded default withdraw wallet address

doDeposit

nodes.documentation:
@dev get deposit contract address by using the default withdraw wallet

     * @param _wallet the binded default withdraw wallet address
nodes.name: getDepositAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev get deposit balance and frozen amount by using the deposit address

     * @param _deposit the deposit contract address
nodes.name: getDepositInfo

nodes.documentation:
@dev get the number of withdraw wallet addresses bindig to the deposit contract address

     * @param _deposit the deposit contract address
nodes.name: getDepositWithdrawCount
getDepositWithdrawList
changeDefaultWithdraw
freezeTokens
withdrawWithFee
checkWithdrawAddress
withdrawFromThis

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "wallet address must be correct with wallet name!"

arguments.value: wallet address must be correct with wallet name!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "wallet address must be correct with wallet name!"

nodes.documentation:
